Document.name: Compile
Document.returns: The generated assembly. Return nullptr if failed to compile.
Document.param: The workflow parser table. It can be retrived from . This is reusable, it is recommended to keep this object alive between multiple compiling to improve performance.
The scope manager. This is reusable, it is recommended to keep this object alive between multiple compiling to improve performance.
Container to get all errors generated during compiling.
